banned for being the 2nd rewdew.

you know what question i get asked most is? "why is your name Rewdew2, and not just Rewdew"

the answer is simple.

Long ago (4 years ago-ish) i created a ROBLOX account (back when sparks 'n' stuff was new)

but RewDew was taken, and i didn't want to come up with a new name so i just do RewDew2

AND THUS THE REWDEW2 WAS BORN FROM THE ASHES OF MY LAZINESS.

(yes, i really played roblox when i was 12.... Who didn't?)

And person above me, sorry but...

Banned for standing up for me.

Banned for standing up for me.

Heh, I played Roblox too when I was younger. Sucks because this game had a huge potential with those who actually knew how to build stuff in it and write scripts and all, but the community... gosh, it's ridiculous. The good builders left one after the other because they couldn't stand the community. It's like if everyone in KSP literally asked everyday "hey is 0.21 finished?" and got pissed when they were told no. Doing stuff for people that aren't thankful for your work really sucks. Plus everyone just spent their time insulting each other or ruining what the person was doing instead of letting them play. Seriously, Roblox was awesome, the community was ****.

Anyway, back on topic.

Banned for having less than 0.5 post/day
Banned for being a Chris whom is stupid (?)
